results.name: Room in trendiest area of Hong Kong
results.summary: Nice flat in really cool area of Hong Kong, few mins walk to central/ soho. Can hike to the peak easily! The room is quiet small but but very confortable. Brand new bathroom and kitchen very well equipped, nice open bar too. Sharing with one girl!

results.summary: 唐樓 72 是香港首間以「老香港」舊式唐樓情懷為主題的住宅式宿舍,香港獨家。 裝修是延用保持舊式唐樓板間房特色 適合想體驗懷舊風格 是香港绝無僅有的文化遺產 交通方便 位於旅行者必到的'女人街'內 Is Hong Kong first in old tenement buildings feelings themed hotels, the exclusive Hong Kong. For publishers who  want to experience nostalgia.
results.space: 唐樓 (Tong Lau) 72 是香港首間以「老香港」情懷為主題的旅館。 自六、七十年代,香港經濟起飛,那時正是香港的黃金時代,唐樓成為香港居民的主流建築,冬暖夏涼,成為不少香港人一家老小的安樂窩。唐樓 72保存這份本土絕無僅有的懷舊特色,推廣至世界各地旅客,體驗這份「香港情」。 We cherish the old Hong Kong living style and provide the most comfortable guesthouse to every travel from the world!

results.house_rules: Instruction ID verification e.g., passport are required upon your arrival.  NO SMOKING is allowed.  Please take off your shoes when you enter. We serve mules.  Please be sure to lock all windows and doors before leaving the house.  Please turn off the air conditioner/heater/TV when not there or unused.  You are advised to turn on the water-heater 15 minutes before shower. Please finish your shower within 15 minutes while the washrooms are 24hrs available. Please turn off all the lights (except the living room) after 11pm. Please locate your trash in the rubbish bin. Wifi : Tong72  Tong Lau 72 reserves the final say on any occasion. Most importantly, make yourself at home and be comfortable. 指引 1. 入住時必須登記個人資料,如護照､身份證 2. 嚴禁吸煙 3. 進入時請脫鞋,我們提供拖鞋 4. 請務必在離開前關好門窗｡ 5. 無人或未使用時請關掉空調/熱水器/電視 6. 建議您淋浴前15分鐘開動熱水爐 7. 請在15分鐘內完成你的淋浴,而廁所24小時可用 8. 請晚上11時後關掉所有的燈(除客廳)｡ 9. 不要任何噪音｡ 10. 請把垃圾置在垃圾桶內 11. results.neighborhood_overview: 8-10 minutes cab ride from Hong Kong Station - 23 minutes from Hong Kong International Airport This area is between the quiet upper side of Central and Central Business District where most shops, restaurants and happenings are.   A hip soho area, slightly quieter than the bar scene in Lan Kwai Fong but with convenience to get to everywhere in Hong Kong (Central MTR close by and many other mode of transport to get to any touristic sites including ferry to islands)
results.transit: There are buses, mini-buses, taxi on the main road right off the building with frequent rides, 5-8 minutes walk to Central MTR (in CBD of Hong Kong), 10 minutes car ride to Hong Kong Station (to Airport) and 8 minutes car ride to Central Pier, and tramlines.  The walk from the flat strolling down to Central is also very scenic and comfortable.

results.name: ☆MONG KOK☆ 2-BR for 6 & Rooftop
results.summary: This apartment is located in a VERY VERY convenient location with Yau Ma Tei and Mong Kok MTR within 100 meter to anywhere in Hong Kong. Huge 2 bedroom apartment with exclusive rooftop terrace to keep an eye of the cityscape.
results.space: This 2 bedroom apartment is exclusively yours when you rent it. It comes with a FREE TO USE ROOF TERRACE! The apartment is conveniently situated in the bustling Yau Tsim Mong district (abbreviation for Yau Ma Tei, Tsim Sha Tsui & Mong Kok). It is next to the Mong Kok and Yau Ma Tei MTR and if you wish to you can walk to Tsim Sha Tsui or just walk around Mong Kok, which is a stone throw away.  This apartment is located in a VERY VERY convenient location with Yau Ma Tei and Mong Kok MTR within 100 meter to anywhere in Hong Kong. The apartment comes with the following: Free WIFI TV Cable TV Air-conditioner in all rooms Utensils / Plates Washer Essentials like bath gel and shampoo Fresh clean bed sheets, fresh clean towels Refridgerator Microwave About the apartment: Bedroom 1 has a double bed to sleep comfortably. results.neighborhood_overview: Yau Tsim Mong District (simplified Chinese: 油尖旺区; traditional Chinese: 油尖旺區; pinyin: Yóujiānwàng Qū, Jyutping: jau4 zim1 wong6 keoi1) is one of 18 districts of Hong Kong, located on the western part of Kowloon Peninsula. It is the core urban area of Kowloon. The district has the third highest population density of all districts. The 2006 By-Census recorded the total population of Yau Tsim Mong District at 280,548. Primarily, MTR will get you around quickly. It is located 100 meter away (Yau Ma Tei or Mong Kok MTR station). If you wish to go anywhere by bus in Hong Kong, you can take the bus to whole Hong Kong from Nathan Road. Lastly, if you wish to go on a day trip to Macau, you can take the bus/taxi to the China Ferry Terminal. Ferries sail to Macau every half an hour.
results.notes: You agree that by booking this place you agree to the Host's license agreement and terms and conditions in it's entirety. LOSS OF KEYS incur a HK 300 replacement fee. If there is no replacement key available and locksmith is called to help, the fee is HK 700. Please note that we are not responsible for loss of keys. LATE CHECKOUT not priorly agreed to automatically incur a HK 500 late check-out fee that will be deducted from the deposit. PLEASE NOTE that you will be required to sign an agreement digitally or physically either prior to or upon check-in governing your stay at our properties in order to safeguard both parties.
results.transit: You do not have to worry about transportation at this apartment. It is so convenient located!! You do not have to worry about transportation at this apartment. It is so convenient located!! The MTR is 100 meters away.
results.access: This 2 bedroom apartment is exclusively yours when you rent it. The roof terrace is yours exclusively also. You will have access to the whole apartment.
results.interaction: You will be able to communicate with me anytime during the stay if you need anything.  I will be available all the time by phone, AIRBNB messenger, email etc.

Strictly NO SMOKING. Please treat this as your own home. Please kindly empty the trash when needed, instead of emptying the trash in one go after multiple days. The rubbish can be disposed into the rubbish bin at the emergency staircase. Please kindly do not congregate in front of the main entrance to the building on check-in or at any time. Please kindly do not block the entrance to the building or wait in front of the lift in the lobby. results.name: 3Bdr at Langham Place in Mong Kok
results.summary: This beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Mong Kok, just steps from the MTR station and Langham Place. It has three bedrooms and a big common area, making it suitable for families and small groups. You’ll love the flat and its convenience.
results.space: This is a beautifully renovated three-bedroom flat located right across from Langham Place in the heart of Mong Kok, one of Hong Kong’s most vibrant neighborhoods. Guests will have plenty of room to relax in its three bedrooms, which are ideal for a small family or even small groups. You will find an equipped kitchen that is suitable for making small meals as well as room to eat a meal with friends. So if you feel you need a break from Mong Kok’s seemingly endless selection of restaurants, you can enjoy a home-cooked meal. We have put a lot of effort into ensuring that you will be comfortable during your stay.
results.description: This beautiful apartment is located in the heart of Mong Kok, just steps from the MTR station and Langham Place. It has three bedrooms and a big common area, making it suitable for families and small groups. You’ll love the flat and its convenience. However, please do not put anything in the external corridor that leads from the front door to t
results.neighborhood_overview: Just downstairs is Shanghai Street. There, you will find a large selection of local cafes to sample and many types of stores selling everyday items, from cosmetics to shoes to electronics. Shanghai Street also passes right by Langham Place. This tall building – located across the street from the flat – holds a popular shopping mall and an MTR entrance.  The flat is located in Mong Kok, one of Hong Kong’s densest areas. It is filled to the brim with all sorts of shops and restaurants. Famous markets in the area include the Ladies Market (on Tung Choi Street south of Argyle Street), the Flower and Bird Markets (north of Prince Edward Road West and west of Sai Yee Street), the Goldfish Market (on Tung Choi Street north of Burd Street) and the Sai Yeung Choi electronics market. It becomes a pedestrian zone on weekends after 4pm.  The Ladies Market is a famous souvenir market. The Bird Market has an amazing diversity of birds and bird products on sale. The Flower Market and Goldfish Markets
results.notes: The apartment, including all bedding and towels, will be thoroughly cleaned before your arrival. If you'd like to have the apartment cleaned during your stay, please let me know and I can arrange it for an extra cost of HK300.
results.transit: From point A to point B: MTR: The closest MTR station is Mong Kok Station (Exit C4), located one minute away from the flat. You may come out of Exit C4 and walk two streets west on Argyle Road. That is Shanghai Street. The flat is on that corner. You may purchase single-journey tickets or an Octopus card for convenient local travel.  Bus: Buses going to many places run up and down Nathan Road. Note that buses require exact change or Octopus payment. Taxi: There are plenty of taxis in this area. Flagfall is currently HK22. Drivers almost always remember to use the meter, but do pay attention. Also, if you plan to travel longer distances by taxi, or plan to cross the harbor, be aware that passengers are responsible for toll payments. To estimate taxi fares, you may use a site such as (URL HIDDEN) Tolls are not calculated by this site.  Foot: We like to walk unless the distance is greater than that of one MTR stop. In general, most of the area is accessible by foot, although it does help
results.access: Guests may access the entire space. However, please do not put anything in the external corridor that leads from the front door to the lifts. Other residents on the floor use this corridor to access their own flats. We do not wish to inconvenience them.
results.interaction: We will provide you everything you need to access the flat on your first visit. We will also be on hand to repair any damage caused by usual wear and tear. Occasionally, my assistant or I might pop by to check on some things. Otherwise, we will be accessible by telephone.
results.house_rules: It looks like a lot, but most of these are common-sense rules.  1- Smoking: Do not smoke in the apartment.  2- Shoes: Hong Kong streets are dirty. Please remove your shoes before you enter the flat.  3- Hot Water: To turn on the hot water, flip the switch outside the bathroom door. The water will take a few minutes to heat up. Please turn off the hot water switch when hot water is not in use. 4- Air Con: Help us save electricity and conserve the environment by turning off the air conditioning when you leave the flat. 5- Television and Wi-Fi: Instructions are posted next to or on the television and wireless antenna. 6- Rubbish: Rubbish removal is your responsibility. Please empty your rubbish in the bin in the stairwell. 7- Cleaning: Please keep our flat tidy. We will not come in to clean during your stay, but if you require a cleaning service, we will provide it to you for HK300 per cleaning.  8- Plants: Please do NOT water any plants. In the past, overwatering by Good Samaritan guest
results.host_about: I am from England and Lived in Hong Kong my whole life, I am now renting out my apartment to holiday makers.

results.name: Your hip home away from home in Kennedy Town
results.summary: Located in up and coming Kennedy Town you're walking distance from great coffee, awesome food and wide open views of the harbour and the amazing HK skyline. My place is close to the MTR, bus and trams - venturing into the city centre will only take you 10 minutes. And if you want downtime away from it all, you can Netflix and chill on the comfiest couch in Hong Kong in a light filled atmosphere.

results.space: 自六、七十年代,香港經濟起飛,那時正是香港的黃金時代,唐樓成為香港居民的主流建築,冬暖夏涼,成為不少香港人一家老小的安樂窩。唐樓 72保存這份本土絕無僅有的懷舊特色,推廣至世界各地旅客,體驗這份「香港情」。 Since the sixties and seventies, Hong Kong's economic take-off, when it is Hong Kong's golden age, 'tenement buildings'(唐樓) to become the mainstream architecture of Hong Kong residents, cool, as many Hong Kong families to the comfort zone. 72 tenement buildings save this unique nostalgic local specialties, extended to travelers around the world to experience this "Hong Kong situation."
results.description: 全新舊式唐樓裝修,合尋找香港舊日的足跡人仕,體現感受香港味道,感受舊式唐樓,板間房....... The new renovated old tenement buildings, co someone looking for the old footprint Hong Kong, Hong Kong reflects the feelings of taste, feel among old tenement buildings, board room ....... 自六、七十年代,香港經濟起飛,那時正是香港的黃金時代,唐樓成為香港居民的主流建築,冬暖夏涼,成為不少香港人一家老小的安樂窩。唐樓 72保存這份本土絕無僅有的懷舊特色,推廣至世界各地旅客,體驗這份「香港情」。 Since the sixties and seventies, Hong Kong's economic take-off, when it is Hong Kong's golden age, 'tenement buildings'(唐樓) to become the mainstream architecture of Hong Kong residents, cool, as many Hong Kong families to the comfort zone. 72 tenement buildings save this unique nostalgic local specialties, extended to travelers around the world to experience this "Hong Kong situation." Hope you come together and enjoy the days in Hong Kong~ 希望可以結伴同行, 同遊香港的大城小事 主人沿用舊式板間房概念 維護香港舊情懷 如果想體驗吓香港人舊時足跡 這是你最好的選擇 The owner preserve the concept of traditional Hong Kong flats, maintains the old feelings. If you want to experience the old Hong Kong, this is your

results.name: Bed in the living-rooom in SoHO
results.summary: I am a French young professional living in Hong-Kong and I would be delighted to welcome you in my home : - Situated in the centre of Soho (10 min. Central MTR) - Double air-bed mattress in the living-room (we share the bathroom and the living-room)
results.space: Central situation, 10 minutes from Central station and Airport Express. Beautiful area with a lot of restaurants and pubs, quiet on the night. You will sleep in the living-room which is quite small but cosy. You have a direct access to the bathroom. Comfortable air-bed mattress and functional kitchen if you wish to cook.
results.description: I am a French young professional living in Hong-Kong and I would be delighted to welcome you in my home : - Situated in the centre of Soho (10 min. Central MTR) - Double air-bed mattress in the living-room (we share the bathroom and the living-room)
results.transit: 10 min. from Central MTR station. Along the Mid-levels Escalators.
results.access: Your bed is in the living-room where you can also use the kitchen. The bathroom is next to the living-room. You can also enjoy spending time on our private rooftop.
results.interaction: I'm usually working during the weekdays but I am free in the evening to show you around. You will have your own key during your stay so you can go in and go out of the flat anytime you want.
results.house_rules: My appartment only accept girls, sorry guys :)

results.name: Tidy Room at Lan Kwai Fong, Central
results.summary: At the center of Lan Kwai Fong, the most convenient location in Central, Hong Kong, 5 minutes to the Central MTR station and next door to 200 restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Third Floor walk up.
results.space: We are at the center of Lan Kwai Fong, just downstairs and you can have access to all that is FUN! Bars, clubs, shops and restaurants to choose from. Beware the magnetic and heavy music from the bars and clubs nearby! When you are done with your adventure for the day, no more long walks or taxi rides to tire you. It is a private room so you can be as comfy as you can get and have the privacy and relaxation time you need. Wifi and TV are available for your entertainment. Weekends are throbbing with music and activities, not for the light sleepers amongst yours

results.name: Cosy Flat in the Center of HK
results.summary: Nice quiet apartment in the busy shopping center of Hong Kong, Causeway Bay. Surrounded by pretty much every shops, restaurants and activities you could dream of !
results.space: Quiet space in the middle of Hong Kong. The flat is small but has everything you need.  It is basically in the center of the Hong Kong Island and 50m away from the biggest shopping malls in Asia. Flat can accommodate 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 kids.
results.description: Nice quiet apartment in the busy shopping center of Hong Kong, Causeway Bay. Surrounded by pretty much every shops, restaurants and activities you could dream of ! Quiet space in the middle of Hong Kong. The flat is small but has everything you need.  It is basically in the center of the Hong Kong Island and 50m away from the biggest shopping malls in Asia. Flat can accommodate 3 adults or 2 adults and 2 kids. Private flat with a living room, a bed room and bathroom. Queen size bed in the bedroom, sofa-bed in the living room.  All necessary items to cook are available.  Good WiFi connection also. I rent the flat during my vacations/business trip, can meet at the check-in or the check-out. I will give you information about the neighborhood and Hong Kong with some guides and maps. It is THE Shopping district. 4 malls within 100m radius, more restaurant than you can imagine and you can basically buy anything you want. some of the best asian food restaurant, the biggest park of hong kong,
results.neighborhood_overview: It is THE Shopping district. 4 malls within 100m radius, more restaurant than you can imagine and you can basically buy anything you want. some of the best asian food restaurant, the biggest park of hong kong, the horse racing stadium within 15min walk...

results.summary: This apartment have a double bed in the bedroom , and one bulk bed in the living room. It fits for 5 people altogether.
results.space: its located in the very center of Mong Kong, the famous Fa Yuen street, right behind the lady market. It's In the most popular part of HK, Mong Kok sport shoes street. Cafe/resto/bars/boutiques/resturant just down the street and 8 mins to Mong Kok Mtr station - transport, food, groceries at doorstep. results.name: Causeway Bay / Tai Hang Designer
results.summary: One-of-kind architect-designed studio in the desired hipster neighborhood of Tai Hang. Coffee Shops and bars, delicious Cantonese and Western restaurants among the warren of alleys below the flat, just a few minutes taxi to Central, So Ho, the Peak, Admiralty, MTR and several bus lines. One flat per floor means privacy for your visit to this awesome island
results.space: Our space was designed by artists/architects. You will live like locals in a chill and relaxed area of Hong Kong. Newly renovated only 2 years ago. Tai Hang is a famous area of Hong Kong with many hip restauratns, cafes, bars and dessert shops. Studio flat includes 1 open bedroom and 1 kitchen, the building has a lift. -Free wifi -Air conditioners/ Heaters -Double bed with drawers underneath, single bed with drawers underneath 1 wardrobe and plenty of storage space.  Kitchen- Full-Size refrigerator Toaster Oven, Stove, coffee maker -fully equipped with cutlery, utensils, servingware

results.neighborhood_overview: Amazing neighborhood sandwiched between Victoria Park and the bustling centre of Causeway Bay. Only an 8 minute walk to the buzz and excitement of Times Square but also 5 minute walk to the famous and peaceful Victoria Park and Hong Kong public library
results.notes: We think of you as our guest and hope you enjoy our apartment! We offer a new bottle of wine, fresh coffee and tea, as well as two cold bottles of water with each stay.  Our complimentary Egyptian cotton sheets and new towels are freshly laundered at the laundromat across the street for each stay.  We have a professional cleaner that comes in after each guest.
results.transit: 7 min walk to Causeway Bay, 5 minute walk to MTR subway station. only 4 minute walk to Victoria Park, tennis courts and major bus area. Restaurants and a large supermarket just across the street
results.access: The apartment is private, you will be alone in the apartment and have the entire floor with your own washroom ( full bathtub and sink)? and kitchen ( gas stove, full refrigerator, washing machine and kitchen sink   (The building is 1 apartment per floor).  Please contact me through Airbnb, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), email if you have queries. I will be happy to give recommendations for places to visit and local restaurants
results.interaction: We will be available to help you throughout your stay!  We both work but we would like to show you as much hospitality as we can and are available for any Hong Kong recommendations. We have lived in Hong Kong for over 9 years so know the city quite well.  Restaurant recommendations, tourist attractions, translation services, just let us know and we are available!
results.house_rules: Please take care of the apartment as it was your own apartment. No smoking indoors, and please remove your shoes inside.  Turn off air conditioners and lights each time you leave the apartment
results.host_about: Phd Student and Art Curator, Canadian based in Hong Kong.

results.name: Hong Kong harbour view near Central
results.summary: Fully furnished 3 bedroom apartment with stunning panoramic views. Situated on top of Kennedy Town/ Sai Wan, on the harbour's edge, overlooking Hong Kong and Kowloon beautiful skyline. New building, high ceilings and lots of space. MTR: HKU 3 min
results.space: Perfect place for family holiday or just a business trip. All the facilities available, and services from transportation, laundry and house keeping.
results.description: Fully furnished 3 bedroom apartment with stunning panoramic views. Situated on top of Kennedy Town/ Sai Wan, on the harbour's edge, overlooking Hong Kong and Kowloon beautiful skyline. New building, high ceilings and lots of space. MTR: HKU 3 min Perfect place for family holiday or just a business trip. All the facilities available, and services from transportation, laundry and house keeping. Guests have access to:  - FREE WiFi  - Refrigerator with freezer  - Large flat screen TV  - Iron/Ironing Board  - Towels, Sheets, Toilet Paper, Shampoo, Soap, etc. Access to the gym and pool with extra charge. I am available to meet with our guests most of the time. Neighbourhood main locals. Upcoming since new MTR station will open in a few months. 5 minutes away from IFC/ Central by minibus(54). Transport from Hong Kong International Airport to the Apartment:   By Airport Express Train: Get off at Central (last station at Hong Kong Island, Cost 100 or you can buy 30 day 2 ways Ticket at HK180)

results.notes: Wonderful open public swim pool in Kennedy Town 2 minutes walk.

Transport from Hong Kong International Airport to the Apartment:   By Airport Express Train: Get off at Central (last station at Hong Kong Island, Cost 100 or you can buy 30 day 2 ways Ticket at HK180) and take a taxi (cost HK35-45 depends on traffic)  Bus A10 (cost 44, take 40min to arrive in Kennedy Town.  By Taxi: (Point-to-Point, cater to maximum 5 passengers, cost around HK300-400 depend on Traffic, can only cater 2-3 medium to large size luggage at the trunk)

results.house_rules: Your check-in time starts from about 2:30 pm whereas your heck-out time wil be at about 10:00 am.  • Please respect that we only accept the number of guests the apartment was booked for.  • Please switch off lights, air-conditioning and all appliances when you leave the apartment to avoid wasting energy. The airconditioner are working very efficiently and you won't feel hot in summer after a couple of minutes.  • Please ensure that the windows and doors are locked when you left the apartment.  • Please respect your neighbors as you live in a normal building with normal tenants. For example keep the noise level down from 10:00 PM till 8 AM and be nice if you meet someone in the hall or in the lift.  • Pets are not allowed in our apartments.
results.host_about: I work in Fashion Design and travel for business most of the time. I am interested in swapping apartments as well.

results.space: Fully renovated, the highlight of the flat is its spacious and bright living room which gives access to the large balcony. The flat is decorated with a lot of contemporary art. Each room has windows overlooking the Hong Kong Harbour. The kitchen is fully equipped and bathroom has both a shower and a bathtub. Total dimension of the flat is 1000 square feet.

Total dimension of the flat is 1000 square feet. Guests can easily access the building by taxi or MTR. The flat is located right next to the Excelsior hotel which makes it very convenient to access. results.name: Luxury Living, Downtown Condo +View
results.summary: Hottest and newest neighborhood in Downtown HK 港島豪宅 High-living, cosmopolitan, luxurious studio apt with 2 balconies. Built in late 2015. Bright new condo with floor-to-ceiling windows and city views. Conveniently located across Wan Chai MTR Station Exit A3.  Thank you very much to my wonderful guests for the great reviews, and thanks for making me one of the Superhosts in Hong Kong!
results.space: If you want to visit Hong Kong and experience Downtown this is the perfect place. It is in the newest, hottest neighborhood of Hong Kong.  Located on a high floor, condominium apartment and complex was finished in late 2015 and moved in 2016. You will be among the first guests to stay here.  It is a studio apartment, in a multi building development with luxurious and brand new amenities & facilities. There are fantastic restaurants, bars, and shops downstairs. The quality is the standard of a 5 star luxury hotel. The apartment complex is located across Wan Chai MTR station.  STUDIO: •32" Flat Screen cable TV with TV stand •Comfortable, brand new queen sized bed •Sofa bed for 1-2 person •Modern and dimmable lighting •Wifi Internet •Vacuum cleaner •Travel adapter/converter •It is most comfortable for 1-3 persons but can fit up to 5 people. I can bring a portable inflatable mattress upon your request.  KITCHENETTE: •Modern kitchen with everything you need: utensils, plates, bowls, pots, c

results.neighborhood_overview: Wan Chai, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong
results.notes: There is a small fee each time to use the amenities (gym, indoor/outdoor swimming pool, bowling alley).
results.transit: Located across the street from Wan Chai MTR Station. Tram, bus, and subway are all within 1 minute walk.
results.access: You will have the entire apartment.
results.interaction: Upon arrival, I will meet you at a convenient location to pass on the keys to you. Check-in and check-out times may be flexible, send me a message I will try my best to accommodate your request.
results.house_rules: No smoking, no pets, no outside guests other than those accompanying on your trip.  My home is not a hotel, please take good care of it and in the way you would treat your home.
results.host_about:
Hi, I'm Calvin!

I've lived in both Hong Kong and Canada for 10+ years. I travel quite often and always stay as a guest on Airbnb, so I know just exactly what you are looking for in your stay!

大家好,我是Calvin ,很高興在Airbnb認識您們｡

我現在居住在香港,以前是住在加拿大,喜歡旅行,通常去旅行的時候我也會通過Airbnb預定房間.

希望每個住客喜歡香港,喜歡我的公寓;我會真誠的幫您解決問題;希望能得到您們的好評｡
results.street: Queen's Road East, Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

results.name: Central Apt Lan Kwai Fong Rooftop3C
results.summary: Whether you are here for business or just a leisure getaway,this fantastic studio apartment with open kitchen and rooftop garden overlooking Central and the Botanical Gardens will ensure a perfect stay. w/in mins walk to Lan Kwai Fong and Central MTR
results.space: In the heart of Central, a minute walk down to Lan Kwai Fong, world famous for all kinds of restaurants and and bars.  A few more steps and you down on Queen's Road Central where high fashion and local shops line the main and back roads.  Transport-wise, the Central MTR station is 3 minutes walk down, as are the trams, buses and everything else, you will never want for more transport options. The rooftop garden is a fantastic place to spend some down time after a long day in the city and is shared only amongst my other guests in the building so it's a great place to compare shopping and sightseeing notes. I look forward to your arrival in Hong Kong, and will ensure you have a wonderful stay.
results.description: Whether you are here for business or just a leisure getaway,this fantastic studio apartment with open kitchen and rooftop garden overlooking Central and the Botanical Gardens will ensure a perfect stay. w/in mins walk to Lan Kwai Fong and Central MTR In the heart of Central, a minute walk down to Lan Kwai Fong, world famous for all kinds of restaurants and and bars. I look forward to your arrival in Hong Kong, and will ensure you have a wonderful stay. Guests have access to: - FREE WiFi - HD TV and l
results.neighborhood_overview: Monkeys,Flamingoes Flowers & more! Split into themed sections, such as Bamboo Garden, Magnolia Garden & feature over 1000 species of plants & trees with a special emphasis on regional Asian examples.. The best bars in Hong Kong’s Lan Kwai Fong district are some of the best in Asia and night owls will find b/t down&dirty pubs to the continents best nightclubs.  It’s definitely Hong Kong’s playground Whether you are here for business or just a leisure getaway, this open studio rooftop terrace in the heart of Central will complete your perfect stay.The listing’s  within minutes walk to Lan Kwai Fong and the Central MTR.
results.notes: Once you arrive in Hong Kong, everything is quite simple and all starts with a call from the FREE phones at the airport located in the hall immediately after you pass through baggage customs.  There is also a Visitors Center there if you would like to pick up some maps, local travel guides, etc. to read on your way to the apartment.  If you need a local SIM card, there is a 7-11 in the middle section  of the main arrival hall where they see all types of SIM cards, I usually prefer the PCCW brand as it is the larges local operator.
results.transit: Central MTR is 5 min walk down the hill. Trams, buses, mini buses, taxis are all just a stone's throw away to get you all throughout Hong Kong.
results.access: Guests have access to: - FREE WiFi - HD TV and local channels - Hair Dryer - Iron/Ironing Board - Microwave, Hot Water Boiler, Cooker - Towels, Sheets, Toilet Paper, Shampoo, Soap, etc.
results.interaction: As much as possible or invisible if you want. I will try to meet with arriving guests and show them the area.  Whenever guests need information or recommendations, I am always available via messaging or phone.
results.house_rules: This is a Strictly NON SMOKING Flat. UPON ARRIVAL AT PROPERTY, ALL GUESTS MUST WAIT FOR ME AT THE FRONT GATE OUTSIDE OF THE BUILDING.  BUILDING RESIDENTS WILL COMPLAIN TO PROPERTY MANAGEMENT IF THE LOBBY AREA INSIDE BUILDING IS BLOCKED.  THANKS FOR YOUR KIND UNDERSTANDING FOR AN ENJOYABLE STAY. Check in time is AFTER 12:30 pm.  Make sure to contact us by phone at least 30 minutes prior to arrival such that we can meet you at the flat to hand you the keys and acquaint you to the surroundings.  As this is a family business, please try your best to arrive at the apartment as early as possible. After 11:30pm as transport to the apartment is limited for us, we have to charge HKD150 to cover our taxi transport cost to and from the apartment. We are generally exhausted at the end of the day and we really would rather you arrive early and not have to charge this. Guests must wait for us OUTSIDE the building upon arrival and not enter the building without us as this causes unnecessary misunders
results.host_about: I was born in California and raised in Hong Kong. Went to college in the states and returned to Hong Kong a few years ago.  I absolutely love travelling around the region but Hong Kong has always welcomed me home and I look forward to showing off my home town and sharing all the little insights and local specialities with all my guests!
results.street: Glenealy, Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

results.name: Designer's 1-Bedroom Hong Kong Home
results.summary: My home is located in the cool Tai Hang district adjacent to Causeway Bay, and is close to chic restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, public transportation, and several laundromats. You’ll love staying here because of the ambiance of my design-oriented space (i'm an architect), the views of our street outside and surrounding lush green hills around the apartment, and the outdoors spaces around the building (jogging track, sitting park, temple). My place is perfect for solo travellers and couples.
